original_text: After the kingdom was firmly in his control, he executed the officials who had murdered his father the king.
korean_text: 그의 나라가 굳게 서매 그의 부왕을 죽인 신하들을 죽였으나

sentences.original_text: After the kingdom was firmly in his control
sentences.korean_translation: 나라가 그의 통제하에 확고히 들어온 후에

sentences.original_text: who had murdered his father the king
sentences.korean_translation: 그 관리들은 그의 아버지인 왕을 살해했던 자들이었다
